name: Chain Shepherd
description:
It is the end of the season, so its time to gather the flock and see how much they will bring at the market. They are sneaky little creatures, so the dog will come in helpful.

Use WASD to move the shepherd and IJKL to rotate the dog around the shepherd.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This was the first time using the Unity Engine, and I am quite happy with what I managed.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 in less then 48 hours.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Assets used:
Vapxiel - Background
Kenny - Graphics
sonDanielson - Graphics
Richar - Music
VOiD1 - Music
“Music from https://www.zapsplat.com“ - Soundeffects
